ToDo from Email

Slay your inbox with ToDo from Email! ‚öîÔ∏è
ToDo from Email is a Chrome extension that turns your emails into actionable to-dos with ease!   Never miss a deadline again. ‚è∞

Here's the magic:

Effortless Todo Creation: ToDo from Email scans your emails, intelligently extracting tasks from the subject line and content. Just open an email and watch your to-do list populate! ‚ú®
Stay Organized: All your to-dos are stored securely within your browser. No more jumping between apps or losing track of tasks.
Offline Access: Even without internet, you can view and manage your to-dos. Focus on getting things done, anywhere, anytime!
Say goodbye to email overwhelm and hello to productivity!  Get ToDo from Email today!  ‚úÖ
